text: (he nabee!) aap kahen ki ham allaah par tatha jo hamapar utaara gaya aur jo ibraaheem, ismaeel, ishî€¼aaq, yaaqoob evan (unakee) santaanon par utaara gaya tatha jo moosa, eesa tatha any nabiyon ko unake paalanahaar kee or se pradaan kiya gaya hai, (unapar) eemaan laaye. ham un (nabiyon) mein kisee ke beech koee antar nahin[1] karate aur ham usee (allaah) ke aagyaakaaree hain
